author: Helene Braun
title: JPMorgan to Accept Bitcoin ETFs as Loan Collateral in Expansion of Crypto Access: Bloomberg
description: The move follows CEO Jamie Dimon's recent admission that JPMorgan will soon let clients buy bitcoin.
content:
JPMorgan Chase (JPM) plans to let trading and wealth-management clients use certain crypto-linked assets, including spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs), as collateral for loans.
